title: Belly - King, 1995 (4AD)
description:
Belly was a musical band formed in 1991 by former Throwing Muses 

members Tanya Donelly (also in The Breeders with Kim Deal) and Fred 

Abong. Based in Boston, Massachusetts, the band consisted of Tanya 

Donelly on lead vocals, Fred Abong bass, Tom Gorman guitar, and Chris 

Gorman drums. The band had an alternative rock sound that was uniquely 

mixed with both a twist of pop-reminiscent haunted melodies (much like 

those of Julee Cruise and the Cocteau Twins) and an occasional country 

music-like twang, which made it popular with college students searching 

for indie rock bands.

Album:

1. King, 1995 (4AD)
